record.field: A. Operating income (I + II + III + IV)
RS_1003.balance + RS_1004.balance + RS_1005.balance + RS_1006.balance + RS_1007.balance + RS_1008.balance
1. Goods sold to domestic parent companies and subsidiaries
2. Goods sold to foreign parent companies and subsidiaries
3. Goods sold to other associated companies on the domestic market
4. Goods sold to other associated companies on the foreign market
II. Income from products sold and services provided
RS_1010.balance + RS_1011.balance + RS_1012.balance + RS_1013.balance + RS_1014.balance + RS_1015.balance
1. Products sold and services provided to domestic parent companies and subsidiaries
2. Products sold and services provided to foreign parent companies and subsidiaries
3. Products sold and services provided to other associated companies on the domestic market
4. Products sold and services provided to other associated companies on the foreign market
5. Products sold and services provided to domestic customers
6. Products sold and services provided to foreign customers
III. Income from premiums, subsidies, grants, donations and similar
B. Operating expenses (I - II - III + IV + V + VI + VII + VIII + IX + X + XI)
RS_1019.balance - RS_1020.balance - RS_1021.balance + RS_1022.balance + RS_1023.balance + RS_1024.balance + RS_1025.balance + RS_1026.balance + RS_1027.balance + RS_1028.balance + RS_1029.balance
II. Revenue from undertaking for own purposes
III. Increase in inventories of work in progress and finished products and unfinished services
IV. Decrease in inventories of work in progress and finished products and unfinished services
VII. Salaries, wages and other personal indemnities
I. Financial income from associated companies and other financial income (1034 + 1035 + 1036 + 1037)
1. Financial income from parent company and subsidiaries
2. Financial income from other associated companies
3. Share in the profits of associated companies and joint ventures
II. Income from interest (from third parties)
III. Positive effects on exchange rate and effects of foreign currency clause (to third parties)
I. Financial expenses incurred with associated companies and other financial expenses (1042 + 1043 + 1044 + 1045)
1. Financial expenses incurred with parent company and subsidiaries
2. Financial expenses incurred with other associated companies
3. Share in losses of associated companies and joint ventures
III. Negative effects on exchange rate and effects of foreign currency clause (to third parties)
Profit from other regular operations and irregular operations (E - F + G - H + I - J)
RS_1050.balance - RS_1051.balance + RS_1052.balance - RS_1053.balance + RS_1056.balance - RS_1057.balance
E. Income on value adjustment of other assets carried at fair value through profit and loss account
F. Expenses on value adjustment of other assets carried at fair value through profit and loss account
I. Net profit from discontinued operations, effects of changes in accounting policies and corrections of errors from previous periods
J. Net loss from discontinued operations, effects of changes in accounting policies and corrections of errors from previous periods
Profit before tax (Operating + Financing + Other regular and Irregular operations)
Tax on profit (I + II - III + IV)
I. Tax expenses for the period
II. Deferred tax expenses of a period
III. Deferred tax income of a period
IV. Personal indemnities paid to employer
P. Net profit/loss (profit before tax - tax on profit)
